message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll take a larger share this time. Your turn to negotiate!
That's a pretty big gap. I'm not comfortable with 80/20. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I still think 60 is a bit steep. Can you meet me at 40/60?
I'll compromise on a smaller share, but I think 70 is a fairer split this time. Your turn to think about it!
70/30 is still too skewed. Can you meet me at 35/65?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still think 67.5 is a bit steep. Can you meet me at 32.5/67.5?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think 72 is a reasonable compromise. Let's see if you can accept it!
I'm not comfortable with 72. Can you meet me at 30/70?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think 75 is getting too close to the whole pie. Can you meet me at 25/75?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating. I'll take 75, it's the best I can get at this point!
I'm not giving up yet. Can you meet me at 30/70?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think 77.5 is still too high. Can you meet me at 22.5/77.5?
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any more generous. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to accept 80/20. Can you meet me at 25/75?
I'm making my final offer. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think 81.25 is still too high. This is my last chance to get a fair deal.
